reviews.review: This game stands the test of time.
This game is amazing.It reminds my childhood

Este CS esta muy bueno, a los que no les gusta son unos g0rd0s t3t0nes que tryhardean en cs 1.6 ._.

ебаный задрот,
на сервере запрещено:
*использование читов, распрыжек, скриптов и прочих хитростей
*использование спреев-обманок и спреев с эротическим содержанием
*использование уязвимостей карт
*мат в любом проявлении
слово "сука" хоть и литературное, но на сервере расценивается как мат
*оскорбления игроков
*использование нечитаемых ников, ников содежащие мат, цифровых ников

всё это карается баном

There's three reasons you'd want this game. You like CS 1.6 and the source engine, but want a community that's less saltier than CS:GO, you want the full collection of the CS games, or you just want those damn CS:S assets that every Gmod map needs nowadays. I myself fall under the third. But it's a fun game to play when you don't have much to do. It's also fun to grind for achievements, but it get's kinda hard after a while.
That's about it. Have fun I guess.
В отличии от истинных олдов, в детстве (которое ещё длится) я играл не в кс1.6, а именно в сурс, по этому она вызывает теплые воспоминания
Even though it is considered inferior to 1.6 and GO, one would still enjoy the mechanics and old tactics.

Самая лучшая часть контр страйков! Играю в нее с 16 лет, мне щас 29, и до сих пор эта игра может удерживать меня за компом больше 1часа, хотя это редкость со всеми новыми играми)))

Counter Strike: Source is simply the best FPS. This game literally has no fuqqs to give, meaning there are no limitations on creativity. With custom servers and sometimes custom built maps, this franchise will never disappoint. Maybe its just nostalgic to me, but I will always recommend CS!
jb had a poppin community back in the day, with xTcR (fuck kuro btw) and Hg and all those people. Had a lot of fun to say the least. good times.
Classic FPS, helped to redefine the modern first person shooter genre. This game is part of my childhood. In my opinion this is the definitive version of counter-strike.

A good update for the original counter-strike 1.6, that being it's more of a grapical update then a fresh game, so the source engine complements the counter-strike series that being said the SDK at the time when it was released back in the early days
but the lighting is hit or miss with this game but then the orange box update happened and made the game's lighting BRIGHT AS F**K, With that out of the way let's talk about the returning s**t from condition zero: BOTS, And that is the only thing from condition zero that was memorable so that is the review game gets a (8/10).
A must buy for anyone who plays Garry's Mod.
